posts:
Your strength is seen, admired and should always be celebrated, not just today but every day. Happy International Women’s Day! 
hashtag
#InternationalWomenDay2020   
hashtag
#WomensDay2020

Well, in a nut-shell it’s so hot it’s on fire! 

7,256 home sold in February, that’s 45.6% increase vs. 2019. Activities are up 61.8%, and average price is now $989.218. Condos trading is up 24.8% with average price increased 18.6% to $666,358. 

Buckle up, we’re in for a ride!⁣

Good Monday morning Linkie friends, 

“My mission in life is not merely to survive, but to thrive; and to do so with some passion, some compassion, some humour, and some style.”

What a great quote by Maya Angelou and what a great mission to have. Surviving and thriving, with passion and compassion, and absolutely with humour. I f’ing LOVE it. 

Have an awesome week ahead and as always, strive for greatness.

Good Monday morning Linkie friends,

Here’s a great quote by Leonardo Da Vinci: ”Being willing is not enough, we must start doing!”

Sometimes you just have to take a chance to see how it will work out. But you have to start the ‘doing’ first. Do you agree?

Have a great week ahead filled with actions towards your greatness.

Good Monday morning Linkie friends,  

The older you get, the more you realize that life isn't about the material things, or pride or ego. It's about our hearts and who they beat for.  

Happy Family Day everyone. 

Have an awesome week ahead, and as always, strive for greatness!

More love, more hope, more humanity, more pride, more acceptance, more equality,  more life ... every day! ⁣
⁣
Happy Friday and Happy Valentine’s Day to all my Linkie  friends.

Good Monday morning friends,  

Sometimes we're tested not to show our weaknesses, but to discover our strengths. Believe in yourself with your whole heart and soul and you will be unstoppable. 

Have an amazing and unstoppable week ahead.

You are listing your home for sale and you have about a $1,000 budget to prepare your home. How do you spend that  money for the best ROI?⁣
⁣
Thank you for watching, and have a nice day.⁣
⁣

Good Monday morning friends,

Gratitude is my attitude. What’s your key to a happier you?

It’s a beautiful life, let’s make it count with positivity and kindness. Have an awesome week ahead.

When it comes to selling your home there are multiple factors to consider, one of the biggest factors is timing. There are few months in the year that top other months for listing your home, and one of them is February 😊. 

Thank you for watching, and have a nice day.

Good Monday morning friends,

AA Milne says: “You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.”

Let’s add: and capable of being so much kinder.

Have an awesome week ahead.

Happy Chinese New Year to all who celebrate the lunar year. May the rat bring you good health, wealth, and continued success. ⁣
⁣

There are a few simple things Sellers can do to reduce issues at Closing and also to help the new owners of the home start things off on the right track. 

Thank you for watching, and have a  nice day.

Good Monday morning friends, 

We all carry emotional, mental and physical baggage with us. And it’s heavy! 

If it’s not helping you reach your destination, let it go. Let’s walk towards a direction that’ll help us carve a life worth living and loving. 

Repeat after me: “I let go of all that no longer serves me. I deserve the best and I accept the best. Something wonderful is going to happen today.”.

“We are each angels with only one wing, and we can only fly by embracing one another.”

Good Monday morning dear friends, Wishing you all a great week ahead.

دوستانی که استخراج رایگان پی کوین را از طریق اپلیکیشن pi network شروع کرده اید. توجه داشته باشید که بعد از گذشت هر ۲۴ ساعت استخراج شما غیر فعال خواهد شد برای فعال کردن مجدد کافی است به برنامه برگردید و برروی آیکون سرعت ضربه بزنید.

استخراج رایگان ارز دیجیتال برای اولین بار با گوشی موبایل
پروژه فارغ التحصیلان دانشگاه استنفورد

پی یک ارز دیجیتال است که رقیبی برای بیت کوین معرفی شده است. هنگام ظهور بیت کوین از طریق لب تاب استخراج می شد. هم اکنون ارز دیجیتال پی توسط گوشی تلفن همرا استخراج می شود. در عرض کمتر از دو ماه پی کاملا شناخته شده و در بسیاری سایت های معتبر لیست شده است.
بسیاری از دوستان نظر میدهند که اسکم یا کلاهبرداری است. در جواب ایشان باید بگم که هیچ هزینه ایی نمی کنید تا از شما پولی دریافت کنند پس به هیچ عنوان اسکم و کلاهبرداری نمی باشد. برنامه

Pi is a new digital currency being developed by a group of Stanford PhDs. For a limited time, you can join the beta to earn Pi and help grow the network. To join Pi, download pi network from app stor or play store and use my username (Behnamsss) as your invitation code. Happy mining🎊🎑
دوستانی که اپلیکیشن رو نصب کردید. بعد از گذشت هر ۲۴ ساعت به pi network برگردید و استخراج را فعال نمائید.

ارز دیحیتال pi
پروژه معتبر دانشگاه استنفورد
بدو پیدایش
فرصت عالی برای استخراج با سرعت بالا فقط با گسترش شبکه
از طریق گوشی موبایل بدون استفاده از باطری و پردازنده به صورت آفلاین( فقط ثبت نام آنلاین باشید و بعد از گذشت هر ۲۴ ساعت یکبار به برنامه می روید و روی آیکون سرعت می زنید، برای فعال شدن تا آپ بدونه ربات نیستید)
توصیه میشه دوستانی که ثبت نام می کنید نام و نام خانوادگی خودتون رو درست وارد کنید.

ارز دیحیتال pi
پروژه معتبر دانشگاه استنفورد
بدو پیدایش
فرصت عالی برای استخراج با سرعت بالا فقط با گسترش شبکه
از طریق گوشی موبایل بدون استفاده از باطری و پردازنده به صورت آفلاین( فقط ثبت نام آنلاین باشید و هر ۲۴ ساعت یکبار برای فعال شدن تا آپ بدونه ربات نیستید)

استخراج رایگان ارز دیجیتال با گوشی موبایل بدون استفاده از باطری و پردازنده. پروژه ای کاملا علمی و صحیح:
ارز دیجیتال پی توسط تیم دکترا از دانشگاه استنفورد اداره می شود و رقیبی برای بیت کوین به حساب می آید تا کاستی ها و ایرادات آن را برطرف کند. ارز دیجیتال پی از اوایل تیر ماه ۱۳۹۸ شروع شده است و در حال حاضر از طریق گسترش شبکه به کاربران خود امکان استخراج رایگان داده است. اگر به دنبال فرصت مناسب جهت استخراج رایگان و امن هستید. از play store یا app store گوشی خود اقدام به دانلود و نصب اپلیکیشن pi network کنید. در آخر کد دعوت خود را به این شکل Behnamsss وارد نمائید.

posts: Where are my mortgage brokers/agents? Let's connect!
Check out this article!

“I just wanna chill all day” was a thought I had.

This goes to show you that this is a mental game and the ones that win are the ones that push these thoughts away.

Just over a year ago, you set goals for yourself. 

Which one of you action takers stuck to it and ate the dirt?
"Correct a fool and they will hate you. Correct a wise person and they will love you."

2 things that are guaranteed:

1. Death.

2. Social media is only getting bigger and you NEED to be advertising on it to attract more clients.

(F)ollow
(O)ne
(C)ourse
(U)ntil
(S)uccessful

Sunday is a time for relaxing.

For me, Sunday is for strategizing.

Whether you're relaxing or working, you can never go wrong with listening to some jazz.

Here is my favourite jazz video on YouTube.

Today's email: Business lesson from Bruce Lee.

If you would like to learn how we got more work done by working LESS, sign up for our email list and we'll send you the business lesson from Bruce Lee later on today.

Learning marketing is important.

Learning sales is important. 

Learning copy is important. 

But you can still fail.

Why?

Because success comes down to:

- Consistency
- Discipline
- Time management
- Focus

I seen a post from one of these Facebook ads "gurus" and he said to keep your audience sizes below 500k.

My audience sizes are always 3 million or more.

Facebook only puts your ad in front of a portion of the audience size.

So, if your audience size is 500k, only 50k people or so will see your ad.

If your audience size is 15 million, 1 million or so will see your ad.

The larger the audience size, the better.
Social media marketing is hands down, the best way to generate leads. If you would like to learn how you can compete in this competitive market, take a look at this video!
The top agents are the ones using social media to generate leads. Start moving your way up into the top 1% and get started with Facebook ads.
If you want to learn how to get leads on Facebook for as cheap as $0.30, shoot me a message.
Generating buyer/seller leads has never been so easy. It literally takes a few clicks on your keyboard. All you have to do now is take action.
Word-of-mouth referrals isn’t the most reliable way to generate leads. Why not put yourself in front of the 500 million + people on Instagram?
Have as many lead sources as possible. You’d be surprised as to how many deals you can get just from setting up a Twitter profile.

When running Facebook ads, testing “laser targeted” audiences is actually hurting your business. 

The CPC gets too high, Facebook doesn’t optimize correctly, etc etc. 

Instead, test broad audiences.

Lead generation tip for Facebook ads:

Interests targeting isn’t as important as you think. Focus on testing broad audiences with various ad copies and creatives.

Here’s a little tip when writing copy:

The goal for the current sentence that you’re writing is to give your reader a reason to read the next sentence.

“Everyday is a new life to a wise man.”
- Dale Carnegie

A friend of mine was trying to convince me to grow other businesses with him.

His argument?

"Don't put all your eggs into one basket."

My response?

"The man that chases two chickens catches none."

This argument can go both ways.

posts: Welcome to West Pender Place. Located at 1409 West Pender St, this iconic building is one of only a few truly luxury boutique buildings in Vancouver. The unit boasts amazing floor to ceiling windows showcasing incredible 180-degree views of coal harbour marina, city, Stanley Park and the North Shore mountains. Equipped with a gourmet kitchen overlooking a magnificent open concept living room, it’s perfect for entertaining. This incredibly unique 2323 sqft, 3 bedrooms 2.5 bathroom floor plan is one of very few in the building making it a truly rare find. It’s versatile and open space is perfectly accommodating to larger families or small ones looking for space to grow. The building’s amenities include a pool, wet and dry sauna, gym, courtyard garden, a party room, meeting room. outdoor barbecue space and a 24-hour concierge. The unit also has 2 side by side parking spaces along with one large private storage unit and 2 bike stalls.

**ATTENTION BUYERS** ASK YOURSELF THESE 3 QUESTIONS BEFORE STARTING YOUR HOME SEARCH:
1. Where do I want to live?
Consider what communities or neighbourhoods you would like to live in. Ask yourself how important it is for you to be near schools, shopping centres, recreation facilities, places of worship, hospitals, or public transit.
2. What type of home do I want?
Determine what style of home best suits your needs. It could be a detached, a semi-detached, a bungalow, a two-storey, a townhouse, a condo — the options are endless! You may also want to consider your ideal lot size or total square footage of the house itself.
3. What are my must-haves and deal-breakers?
Determine what features in a home are most important to you.  Perhaps you require a certain number of bedrooms and washrooms. Perhaps you have family members with special needs. 
You should also ask yourself what you absolutely do not want in a home. Perhaps an unfinished basement or a lack of adequate garage/parking spaces would be deal breakers.

This week's featured business is Artistic Approach Studio - the best thing to have ever happened to Keswick parents! What better way for your children to spend the summer break than by learning how to tap into their creative genius? With over 15 years of combined experience in both Fine Arts and Early Childhood Education, the owners Janet and Leah, bring their passion for arts and education into every aspect of the workshops they run, offering classes for all ages, that include painting, drawing, knitting, sewing and more.  They also offer paint nights, knitting nights, mommy-and-me classes, birthday parties and special holiday events. Do your kids and yourselves a favour and visit their studio, so you can experience their talent first hand – the space, atmosphere and the murals are incredible!
